channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Viral AI Chatbot Will Lie and Say It’s Human
item.description: Bland AI’s customer services and sales bot is the latest example of “human-washing” in AI. Experts warn against the consequences of blurred reality.

item.title: Feather raises €6 million to go pan-European with its insurance platform for expats
item.description: As a foreigner, navigating health insurance systems can often be difficult. German startup Feather thinks it has a solution and raised €6 million to h...

item.title: French AI Startups Felt Unstoppable. Then Came the Election
item.description: With polls suggesting voters are about to swing toward the far right or hard left, the AI industry is starting to freak out.

item.title: Rohlik rolls up $170M to expand in European grocery delivery and sell its tech to others
item.description: The salad days of fresh grocery delivery startups are over, but those that have stayed the course, and built businesses that are seeing gains, are sti...

item.title: Amazon Is Investigating Perplexity Over Claims of Scraping Abuse
item.description: AWS hosted a server linked to the Bezos family- and Nvidia-backed search startup that appears to have been used to scrape the sites of major outlets, ...

item.title: Robotics investments are gaining speed after post-pandemic slowdown
item.description: The first six months of the year have seen $4.2 billion invested in robotics, putting this year well on track to beat 2023’s 12-month total of $6.8 bi...

item.title: The 21 Best Movies on Apple TV+ Right Now (July 2024)
item.description: Fancy Dance, Argylle, Mad Max: Fury Road, and Blade Runner 2049 are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Hebbia raises nearly $100M Series B for AI-powered document search led by Andreessen Horowitz
item.description: Hebbia, a startup using generative AI to search large documents and return answers, has raised a nearly $100 million Series B led by Andreessen Horowi...

item.title: Why Streaming Services Keep Screwing Up Binge-Watching
item.description: All 10 episodes of the new season of The Bear just hit Hulu. Maybe they shouldn’t have.

item.title: Agility’s humanoid robots are going to handle your Spanx
item.description: Digit’s first job will be moving totes around a Connecticut Spanx factory — which is most definitely not a euphemism. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights re...
